thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 9 of 3563
thread.title: CustomerArt

author: CustomerArt
title: CustomerArt
text: I made a book order late last night and did not notice that the address I selected was an old, out-of-date address. When I reviewed their email notice that my order had been received I noticed the address error. With one email, Sara found my order before it had been shipped and made the correction. In this time of warp speed shipping, it is really difficult to correct such mistakes. Sara, thank you for your excellent service. You deserve to wear a cape for this one!
